title: New: Elina – Champion
body:
Killer songwriting here from Sweden’s **Elina**.

Already a household name as a songwriter with NEIKED, Zara Larsson and others, Champion is an ambitious and emotive step forward for Elina; part slow burning ballad, part power pop. Check out Champion below.

excerpt.full: Killer songwriting here from Sweden’s Elina. Already a household name as a songwriter with NEIKED, Zara Larsson and others, Champion is an ambitious and emotive step forward for Elina; part slow burning ballad, part power pop. Check out Champion below.
excerpt.short: Killer songwriting here from Sweden's Elina.
